name: fish_species
description: Species of the fish, if identifiable

name: prey_kingdom
description: Kingdom of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_taxon
description: Prey name as given in the original source

name: prey_class
description: Class of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_origin
description: Larval origin of the prey (aquatic, terrestrial. If aquatic_or_terrestrial, then the prey taxa was not exclusively aquatic or terrestrial. If NA, then the prey taxa could not be assigned or identified beyond the description given in the paper - e.g., "bug" or "insects" or "plants", etc.)

name: prey_stage
description: Prey life stage. If multiple life stages (e.g., larvae_adults, larvae_pupae), then the diet value includes all of those stages

name: diet_value
description: Diet value

name: diet_units
description: Diet value units

name: diet_type
description: Diet value type

name: diet_percent
description: Diet percent - All diet values converted to a percent of a total fish's diet.

name: record_id
description: Unique ID of the individual record (one ID per row in the main data set)

name: source_id
description: Unique ID of the dietary source (i.e., table or figure within a citation; e.g., if table 1 and table 2 are used from a single paper, these would each have unique id's).

name: fish_id
description: Unique ID of the fish diet. This - length(unique(trophish_dataset$fish_id)) - is the total number of fish diets in the database.

name: start_date
description: Earliest date of a fish diet collected

name: end_date
description: Latest date of a fish diet collected

name: sampling_interval
description: If diets are a composite, such as mean of multiple samples, then this gives the sampling interval (i.e., monthly, yearly, etc).

name: data_sorted_by
description: What the data were summarized over (e.g., time, season, fish size, etc.)

name: fish_min_length
description: Minimum length of the fish, if multiple fish were measured and reported as a summary

name: fish_average_length
description: Average length of the fish in the sample.

name: fish_max_length
description: Maximum length of the fish, if multiple fish were measured and reported as a summary

name: fish_length_units
description: Units of length. All lengths are in "cm" or are missing as NA

name: fish_length_measure
description: Type of length measure: standard length (SL), fork length (FL), or total length (TL)

name: habitat_loticlentic
description: Whether the habitat is lentic, lotic or mixed (lentic_lotic).

name: longitude
description: Longitude of sample location. Usually from the paper, but occasionally estimated from Google Earth

name: latitude
description: Latitude of sample location. Usually from the paper, but occasionally estimated from Google Earth

name: sample_size_numeric
description: Numeric of the sample_size, if identifiable

name: record_id
description: Unique ID of the individual record (one ID per row in the main data set)

name: prey_taxa_source
description: How the prey taxa were identified

name: prey_kingdom
description: Kingdom of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_phylum
description: Phylum of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_subphylum
description: Subphylum of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_subclass
description: Subclass of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_family
description: Family of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_superclass
description: Superclass of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_genus
description: Genus of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_species
description: Species of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_class
description: Class of the prey, if identifiable

name: prey_order
description: Order of the prey, if identifiable

name: record_id
description: Unique ID of the individual record (one ID per row in the main data set)

name: fish_genus
description: Genus of the fish, if identifiable

name: genus
description: Fish genus

name: fish_family
description: Fish family

name: fish_order
description: Fish order

name: fish_class
description: Fish class

name: fish_super_class
description: Fish super class

name: source_id
description: NA

name: author
description: NA

name: year
description: NA

name: journal
description: NA

name: citation
description: NA

name: table_figure
description: NA

name: record_id
description: Unique ID of the individual record (one ID per row in the main data set)

name: site_name
description: Name and location of the stream

name: country
description: NA

name: continent
description: NA
